feature_model.name: backup
feature_model.feature_tree: :r backup (f_backup) :m backup_extension (f_backup_extension) :m editor_config (f_editor_config) :o minutes (f_minutes) :m autosave (f_autosave) :o backup_onchange (f_backup_onchange) :o commands (f_commands) :m document_class (f_document_class) :m associated_file_ext (f_associated_file_ext) :o spell_check (f_spell_check) :o dos_unix_conversion (f_dos_unix_conversion) :o ext (f_ext) :o syntax_definition_file (f_syntax_definition_file) :m syntax_highlighting (f_syntax_highlighting) :o remove_blank_lines (f_remove_blank_lines) :g [1, 1] : file_bak (f_file_bak) : file_bak_ext (f_file_bak_ext) : file_ext_bak (f_file_ext_bak)
